A. The film had sequences shot in Ooty.
B. The second schedule began in May 2019.

D. Sadak 2 is a sequel to a film released in 1991.
Answer: The film had sequences shot in Ooty, Filming in Ooty occurred during the second schedule, Sadak 2 is a sequel to a film released in 1991.
